sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_log_entity_update ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32) not null, opid number(11) not null, valname varchar2(32 char) not null, fromval varchar2(128 char), toval varchar2(128 char), userid char(32 char) not null, usertext varchar2(32 char) not null, createdate timestamp not null, ip varchar2(32 char) not null, description varchar2(256 char), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_entity_delete ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32), tblname varchar2(32 char) not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar2(32 char) not null, createdate timestamp not null, ip varchar2(32 char) not null, description varchar2(256 char), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_download ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32) not null, filesize number(20) not null, filetype varchar2(16), userid char(32), usertext varchar2(32 char), createdate timestamp not null, ip varchar2(32 char) not null, lastupdate timestamp, description varchar2(256 char), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_login ( id char(32) not null, userid char(32), usertext varchar2(32 char), createdate timestamp not null, logoutdate timestamp, ip varchar2(32 char) not null, description varchar2(256 char), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_pv_stat ( id char(32) not null, lyear number(11) not null, lmonth number(4) not null, lday number(4) not null, lhour number(4) not null, pv number(11) not null, uv number(11) not null, ip number(11) not null, averagetime number(11) not null, mintime number(11) not null, maxtime number(11) not null, primary key(id) );
